trans-unit.source: Represents keys that are generated using symmetric algorithms and are only stored in the local computer's random access memory.
Typically, this class is only used by the infrastructure to transform XML using a symmetric key.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.InMemorySymmetricSecurityKey"></xref> class using the specified symmetric key.
key is `null`.
key is zero length.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.InMemorySymmetricSecurityKey"></xref> class using the specified symmetric key and a value that indicates whether the binary data must be cloned.
symmetricKey is `null`.
symmetricKey is zero length.
Decrypts the specified encrypted key.
Use the static fields of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms> class to specify the algorithm.
The cryptographic algorithm that was used to encrypt the key.
An array of <xref href="System.Byte"></xref> that contains the encrypted key.
An array of <xref href="System.Byte"></xref> that contains the decrypted key.
algorithm is not supported.

The supported algorithms are <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.TripleDesKeyWrap"></xref>, <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes128KeyWrap"></xref>, <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes192KeyWrap"></xref>, and <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes256KeyWrap"></xref>.
Encrypts the specified key.
Use the static fields of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms> class to specify the algorithm.
The cryptographic algorithm to encrypt the key with.
An array of <xref href="System.Byte"></xref> that contains the key.
An array of <xref href="System.Byte"></xref> that contains the encrypted key.
algorithm is not supported.

The supported algorithms are <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.TripleDesKeyWrap"></xref>, <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes128KeyWrap"></xref>, <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes192KeyWrap"></xref>, or <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes256KeyWrap"></xref>.
Generates a derived key using the specified cryptographic algorithm and parameters for the current key.
To specify P-SHA1 as the cryptographic algorithm, use the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Psha1KeyDerivation> field.
A URI that represents the cryptographic algorithm to use to generate the derived key.
An array of <xref href="System.Byte"></xref> that contains the label parameter for the cryptographic algorithm.
An array of <xref href="System.Byte"></xref> that contains the nonce that is used to create a derived key.
The size of the derived key.
The position at which the derived key is located in the byte array that is returned from this method.
An array of <xref href="System.Byte"></xref> that contains the derived key.
algorithm is not supported.
The supported algorithms is <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Psha1KeyDerivation"></xref>.
Gets a transform that decrypts cipher text using the specified cryptographic algorithm.
Use the fields that represent decryption algorithms in the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms> class to specify the algorithm.
A cryptographic algorithm that decrypts cipher text, such as encrypted XML.
An array of <xref href="System.Byte"></xref> that contains the initialization vector (`IV`) for the specified algorithm.
An <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.ICryptoTransform"></xref> that represents the decryption transform.
algorithm is not supported.

The supported algorithms are <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.TripleDesEncryption"></xref>, <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes128Encryption"></xref>, <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes192Encryption"></xref>, and <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes256Encryption"></xref>.
Gets a transform that encrypts XML using the specified cryptographic algorithm.
Use the fields that represent encryption algorithms in the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms> class to specify the algorithm.
A cryptographic algorithm that encrypts XML.
An array of <xref href="System.Byte"></xref> that contains the initialization vector (`IV`) for the specified algorithm.
An <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.ICryptoTransform"></xref> that represents the encryption transform.
algorithm is not supported.

The supported algorithms are <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.TripleDesEncryption"></xref>, <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes128Encryption"></xref>, <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes192Encryption"></xref>, and <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes256Encryption"></xref>.
Gets the size, in bits, of the initialization vector (`IV`) that is required for the specified cryptographic algorithm.
Use the fields that represent encryption algorithms in the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms> class to specify the algorithm.
The cryptographic algorithm to get the size of the initialization vector (`IV`).
The size, in bits, of the initialization vector (`IV`) that is required for the cryptographic algorithm specified in the algorithm parameter.
algorithm is not supported.

The supported algorithms are <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.TripleDesEncryption"></xref>, <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes128Encryption"></xref>, <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes192Encryption"></xref>, and <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes256Encryption"></xref>.
Gets an instance of the specified keyed hash algorithm.
The keyed hash algorithm to get an instance of.
A <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.KeyedHashAlgorithm"></xref> that represents the keyed hash algorithm.
algorithm is not supported.
The supported algorithms is <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.HmacSha1Signature"></xref>.
Gets an instance of the specified symmetric algorithm.
The symmetric algorithm to get an instance of.
A <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm"></xref> that represents the symmetric algorithm.
algorithm is not supported.

The supported algorithms are <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.TripleDesEncryption"></xref>, <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes128Encryption"></xref>, <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes192Encryption"></xref>, <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes256Encryption"></xref>, <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.TripleDesKeyWrap"></xref>, <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes128KeyWrap"></xref>, <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes192KeyWrap"></xref>, and <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes256KeyWrap"></xref>
Gets the bytes that represent the symmetric key.
An array of <xref href="System.Byte"></xref> that contains the symmetric key.
Gets a value that indicates whether the specified algorithm uses asymmetric keys.
The cryptographic algorithm.
`true` when the specified algorithm uses asymmetric keys; otherwise, `false`.
Gets a value that indicates whether the specified algorithm is supported by this class.
The symmetric algorithms that are supported by this class are the algorithms represented by the following fields:
The cryptographic algorithm.
`true` when the specified algorithm is supported by this class; otherwise, `false`.
Gets a value that indicates whether the specified algorithm uses symmetric keys.
The cryptographic algorithm.
`true` when the specified algorithm uses symmetric keys; otherwise, `false`.
Gets the size, in bits, of the key.
The size, in bits, of the key.
